MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the  LL67 and LL68 postcode areas of Cemaes Bay, affecting properties in Cemlyn and Llanfechell and surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2 PM due to urgent repairs to our overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 5 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1 PM on 26th February 2021.
